availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1862-1863

creation.placeName: New York City, New York County, New York

body.p:
Arctic Insurance Company
18 WALL STREET
J. Milton Smith, President.
Vincent Tilyou, Secretary.
New York, 186
State & County of New York, } ss

Personally appeared before me, Joseph M. Wildey, who being by me duly sworn, deposes & says, that he will well and truly, according to the best of his abilities, execute and perform all the duties pertaining to his Office as Commissioner of Deeds &c, for the State of Kentucky, residing in the State of New York

figure.ab:
JOSEPH W. WILDEY,
for Kentucky
COMMISSIONER IN NEW YORK

body.p: Subscribed & sworn before me this 17th day of June A D 1863. Witness my hand & notarial seal

figure.ab:
JOHN H. WASHBURN
NEW YORK
NOTARY PUBLIC

body.p:
New York
Oath of J. W. Wildey
Comr of Deeds
Filed June 22d 1863.
